Translations.Text: Sai bo yi zu, zai tamen de ju chu, que you yizhong jixiang: Liang ge yuanpu, fen lie zuoyou.`Nimen keyi chi nimen de zhu de jiyang, nimen yao ganxie ta. Yige feimei di difang, yige zhi she de zhuzai.'
Suihou, tamen beini, suoyi wo shi shuiku de jiliu qu yan yi tamen, wo ba tamen de liang ge yuanpu, biancheng liang ge zhi shengzhang kuguo, chengliu, he xiewei de suanzao shu de yuanpu.
Wo yin tamen de wang'en er yi zhe baochou tamen, wo zhi chengfa wang'en de ren.
Wo zai tamen yu wo suo fu you di naxie chengshi zhi jian, jianshele xuduo xianzhu de chengshi, wo jun fen ge zhan jian de juli.`Nimen zai qijian ping'an di luxing ruogan zhouye ba!'

Ranhou, tamen shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang zhang ge zhan zhi jian de juli.'Tamen zi qi, suoyi wo yi tamen wei tan zhu. Wo shi tamen liulishisuo. Duiyu mei ge duo ren duoxie de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Yi bo lie si que yi faxian ta dui tamen de caice shi zhengque de, yinwei tamen dou zhuisui ta; zhiyou yi huo xinshi chuwai.
Ta dui tamen suoyi you quanli zhe, zhi wei wo yao bianbie shui shi xinyang houshi de, shui shi huaiyi houshi de. Ni de zhu, shi wanwu de jianhu zhe.

Ni shuo:`Nimen she zhenzhu er ren zuo shenling de, nimen qidao tamen ba: Tamen buneng guanli tiandi jian weichen zhi zhong de shiwu, tamen sihao buneng canyu tiandi de zaohua. Zhenzhu bu yi tamen zhong de renhe yige wei zhushou.'
